basic.description: This seminar involves intensive reading and preparation of position papers concerning current issues in information studies, followed by discussions of these papers with faculty and information specialists.
basic.subject: LIS
basic.title: Seminar in Information Studies

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: Senior standing and three of the following: LIS 3232, LIS 3267, LIS 3342, LIS 4276, and LIS 4351.
